data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Gümüshane, Turkey.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gümüshane, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Gümüshane, Turkey.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Gümüshane, Turkey.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Gümüshane.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Gümüshane, Turkey. Please, stir the 53 believers here to pray for awakening.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Zaza-Alevi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Zaza-Alevi people.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 140,555, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, 141,400 people live in the state of Gümüshane. Please, give them 28 new simple churches this year.
Father, help your children in Gümüshane, Turkey find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
